item.field: Zygmunt Hübner, Arkadiusz Bazak, Tadeusz Schmidt, Józef Nowak, Tadeusz Pluciński, Bogusz Bilewski
At the onset of World War II, a Polish infantry lacking firepower fight to build a strong defense and protect their peninsula against enemy forces.
Who's That Knocking at My Door?
Zina Bethune, Harvey Keitel, Anne Collette, Lennard Kuras, Michael Scala, Harry Northup, Susan Wood, Marissa Mathes, Catherine Scorsese
A woman's revelation that she was once raped sends her boyfriend, a reformed street thug, into an emotional and spiritual tailspin.
